message.body: Hey babe, jut got your email- how did it go?? How's your dad?? Sending lots of love and warm, healing thoughts.
It went really well - triple bypass! I saw him for a little after, he was drugged and intebated but in good shape considering!
I miss you so much! I just want to eat you alive!
So glad it went well- tell him to have a fast and strong recovery from me. Not if I don't devour you first!!!!!!
